snippet.title: RADIOSOL trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist RADIOSOL on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2934330/RADIOSOL/

Telegram channel:
https://t.me/radiosolproject

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/TripletConcept_

Паблик Вконтакте:
https://vk.com/radiosolproject



RADIOSOL is a journey through a desolate world burned by a planetary cataclysm. In search of answers, you will have to navigate through the ruins of megastructures and abandoned cities, avoiding the scorching rays of the Sun.
